data.title: Edwin Ned Smith (1799-1845)
data.meta_description: Is this your ancestor? Compare DNA and explore genealogy for Edwin Smith born 1799 Rockingham, North Carolina, United States died 1845 Rockingham, North Carolina, United States including ancestors + descendants + Y-chromosome DNA + more in the free family tree community.
data.text:
Edwin Ned Smith

Born 26 Aug 1799 in Rockingham, North Carolina, United States

Ancestors

Husband of Elizabeth (Means) Smith — married [date unknown] [location unknown]

Descendants

Father of Henry Smith and Susan (Smith) Kallam

Died 1845 at about age 45 in Rockingham, North Carolina, United States

Profile last modified 11 Feb 2024 | Created 4 Jan 2015

This page has been accessed 510 times.

Biography

Edwin "Ned" Smith was born on 26 August 1799, in Rockingham, North Carolina, United States, his father, Drury Smith, was 54 and his mother, Eleanor Ellen Grogan, was 49. He married Elizabeth Means from 1820 to 1824, in Rockingham, Richmond, North Carolina, United States. They were the parents of at least 7 sons and 4 daughters. He lived in Stokes, North Carolina, United States in 1830. He died in 1845, in Rockingham, North Carolina, United States, at the age of 46, and was buried in Rockingham, North Carolina, United States.[1]

In 1830 Edwin was enumerated in Stokes, Pitt, North Carolina.[2] The household included Edwin Smith.

Edwin died in 1845 and was buried in Rockingham, North Carolina.[3]

See also:

Drury's WILL [4]
